name: Spooky woods
description:
Spooky woods is a tale of friendship,

or it could be a tale of betrayal

it could also be a tale of loneliness.

Mostly spooky woods is a brief adventure conceived during the A Game by its cover gamejam.

It implements light mechanics on a 8bit world wit movement akin to the games of the legend of zelda, while also mixing it all with some visual novel stile conversations good times.

( I strongly recommend playing it in 840x 720 or fullscren resolution with HD scanlines on the stand alone pc version)

using the external full screen button is advised for the web version if chrome is your web browser for preventing the page from scrolling (do not use the in game full screen options along with hd scanlines it might look very ugly)

game made by Jaime sttivend (pyokoanarogue)

with help from:

Unity3d.

anvil studio.

Magical 8bit Plug - YMCK

www.ymck.net/en/download/magical8bitplug/
